questions.quote: Why is nice bad? What kind a of sick society we are living in, when nice is bad?
It's too late. We bought a condo at Del Boca Vista. We're leaving tonight.
Pendant! Those bastards. Well all right, boys. We'll go to that Pakistani restaurant on 46th Street. You're not afraid of a little spice, are you?
No, no. Not mooching. 'Cos at the end of the week, you add 'em all up, and you give me the bill.
You better give me back that bike!  Look at this! Look! Ow. I couldn't even crawl out of bed this morning.
George, Scott's gonna drop by.  He said he never got his boxes.  I'll get the towels.
Oh, is this disruptive? You find it hard to work with someone...interrupting?
I'm very nervous. I'm auditioning to be in the Actor's Studio tonight.
Yes! And I put him up to it, because I'm sick! I'm the one that needs help.
Oh my gosh, I just had a great idea. She could come to the party tomorrow and read Gwen's lips for me.
